document_data.name: ''Amulet of Joy and Sorrow''
document_data.mainbody: e amulet consisted of a silver-colored chain and a blue [[gem]] embedded in a silver front-piece. When worn, it allowed the wearer to grant the semblance of life (as well as intelligence) onto a corpse. However, this only worked on corpses that had mouths, and could not be used on those already [[undead]].
